Uses of Class
org.codehaus.plexus.components.secdispatcher.PinEntry

Packages that use PinEntry
Package
Description
org.codehaus.plexus.components.secdispatcher
 

  • Uses of PinEntry in org.codehaus.plexus.components.secdispatcher

    Methods in org.codehaus.plexus.components.secdispatcher that return PinEntry
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.confirmPin()
    Usable with getPin(), window will contain two input fields and will force user to type in same input in both fields, ie to "confirm" the pin.
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setCancel(String msg)
    Sets the CANCEL button label, by default "Cancel".
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setDescription(String desc)
    Sets additional test in window.
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setError(String error)
    If set, window will show "Error: xxx", usable for second attempt (ie "bad password").
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setKeyInfo(String keyInfo)
    Sets a "stable key handle" for caching purposes.
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setOk(String msg)
    Sets the OK button label, by default "Ok".
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setPrompt(String prompt)
    Sets the prompt.
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setTimeout(Duration timeout)
    Sets the window timeout, if no button pressed and timeout passes, Result will by PinEntry.Outcome.TIMEOUT.
    PinEntry
    PinEntry.setTitle(String title)
    Sets the window title.
